hero.name: Anisa
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: I create innovative web applications with modern technologies

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with extensive experience building scalable web and mobile applications. My expertise spans across modern JavaScript frameworks including React.js, Next.js, and Vue.js, complemented by strong TypeScript proficiency for type-safe development.
about.description_2: With hands-on experience in React Native for mobile development and Node.js for backend solutions, I deliver comprehensive full-stack applications. My technical skills extend to Java for enterprise applications and Cypress for robust end-to-end testing, ensuring high-quality, reliable software.
about.description_3: I bring strong DevOps and cloud expertise through setting up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, implementing Firebase for real-time databases and authentication, and configuring cloud infrastructure on Digital Ocean. This comprehensive skill set enables me to handle projects from development to deployment.
about.description_4: I've enhanced my expertise through specialized courses in Vue.js, AI prompt engineering, and accessibility, demonstrating my commitment to continuous learning. Currently working in a product company, I bring real-world experience while showcasing my passion through the pet projects featured in this portfolio.
about.philosophy: I firmly believe that in today's rapidly evolving tech landscape, it's possible to learn any stack or technology. This adaptability mindset drives my approach to development - embracing new challenges and continuously expanding my toolkit to deliver the best solutions for every project.

kanban.title: Kanban Board
kanban.description: A task management application with reusable components that allows users to manage tasks visually using a board with columns representing different stages of task completion.

chat.description: A real-time chat application built with WebSockets, featuring participant rooms and offline support for seamless communication.

qaigen.description: An AI-powered application that converts requirements into comprehensive test cases and automated tests, streamlining the testing process with intelligent test generation capabilities.
